resources.string: We share a vision of people working together cooperatively and responsibly to achieve their social and economic wellbeing through organizations they own and control.

Focusing on our vision, our Mission is:
“To add value to savings, ensure easy credits and improve the well-being of people and the community through integrated co-operative enterprises that are profitable, secure and member-centred”.These shared values represent the cords that bind us together as a co-operative people.
